user_query: As an investor, I want to explore the social media metrics of different coins. Can you fetch the latest social media metrics for Bitcoin and also provide the live traffic data for scheduled flights departing from Japan?

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest social media metrics for Bitcoin, including data such as mentions, sentiment analysis, and engagement metrics.
Fetch live traffic data for scheduled flights departing from Japan, including details such as flight numbers, statuses, and departure times.
